pages.text: $(li)The Ender Chest is a a variant of the common Chest.$(br)$(li)It contains an inventory exlusive only for you. If other person try opens it, it will show them own exclusive inventory.

$(li)To use the Ender Chest, you need to place it.$(br)$(li)Then, right click on it you can access to a new inventory.$(br)$(li)Once placed, they can only be obtained with a pickaxe with Silk Touch enchant.$(br)$(li)If you try to use a pickaxe that doesn't have this enchant, the Ender Chest will break.
